name: Summoning Rituals for dummies
description:
Thank you for buying Summoning Rituals for dummies:Cthulhu edition

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2016

Info: Use the microphone to read from the Ritual book

When there is a (*) symbol, answer the question.

There are two possible outcomes, depending of how good you cite the ritual book.

If the browser is constantly asking for Allow permision, set the site to Https


Song used:
http://freemusicarchive.org/music/DJ_Spooky
